She is taken in by a group of kindly dwarf miners, but her happiness is threatened when her stepmother returns bearing a poisoned apple. The first ever feature length animated movie, with the voices of Adriana Caselotti and Lucille La Verne.(n)

programme.title: Louis & Luca: The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen.(n)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: A gay couple plan for a weekend of mischief, winding up the Christian owner of a remote Christian B&B. Events take a sinister turn when another guest arrives, who they think might have something more deadly in mind. Thriller, starring Tom Bateman, Sean Teale and Paul McGann.

programme.title: RoboCop 2
programme.desc: The cybernetic law enforcer returns to battle a deranged drug lord. Meanwhile, he is unaware the corporation that created him has scheduled his replacement by a more powerful version. To complete the new cyborg, they need a human brain, and a renegade scientist secretly implants the injured drug lord's brain into the robot, transforming it into an uncontrollable killing machine. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Tom Noonan and Belinda Bauer.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientist's formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck new recruit at an armoured truck company agrees to join his colleagues in a heist on one of their own vehicles, on the condition that no one gets hurt. However, when the plan starts to unravel and a witness is murdered, the thieves begin to turn on one another. Crime thriller, starring Matt Dillon, Columbus Short, Jean Reno and Laurence Fishburne.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Mann's thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Child's series of novels, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall.

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck new recruit at an armoured truck company agrees to join his colleagues in a heist on one of their own vehicles, on the condition that no one gets hurt. However, when the plan starts to unravel and a witness is murdered, the thieves begin to turn on one another. Crime thriller, starring Matt Dillon, Columbus Short, Jean Reno and Laurence Fishburne.

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: A cop investigating the murder of a prostitute in the Los Angeles offices of a Japanese corporation joins forces with a mysterious detective who is an expert on Asian culture. They discover security footage of the killer has been digitally altered, pointing to a secret conspiracy within the company. Thriller, adapted from the novel by Michael Crichton, starring Sean Connery, Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel and Tia Carrere.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger.

programme.title: Roxxy
programme.desc: Romance blooms between a small-town loner and a rebellious punk rocker, but can the pair escape their troubled pasts? Drama, starring Emile Hirsch, Zoe Kravitz and Zoey Deutch.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town. There she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her. Thriller, starring Gina Gershon, Faye Dunaway and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: Secret agents Eggsy and Merlin join forces with their US counterparts to bring down a psychotic femme fatale. Thankfully they are assisted by a veteran hero brought back from the dead. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.

programme.title: xXx: The Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen and Toni Collette.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Child's series of novels, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: Secret agents Eggsy and Merlin join forces with their US counterparts to bring down a psychotic femme fatale. Thankfully they are assisted by a veteran hero brought back from the dead. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town. There she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her. Thriller, starring Gina Gershon, Faye Dunaway and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Software designer Allison is looking for a flatmate and seems to have struck lucky with shy applicant Hedra. However, Allison soon comes to realise her new friend is dangerously obsessed with her, and when she plans a reconciliation with her former boyfriend, a jealous Hedra becomes increasingly unhinged. Psychological thriller, with Bridget Fonda, Jennifer Jason Leigh, and Steven Weber.(n)

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A founding member of a secret society of assassins struggles to cope, as memories of his past misdeeds cause panic attacks and his family starts to fall apart. When he breaks down during the torture of a captive, his employers fear he is no longer reliable - and threaten the lives of his wife and daughter. Action thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and James Cosmo.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: Teenagers Casey and Jonas discover love while on the run, but her corrupt and abusive cop dad isn't far behind. Thriller, starring Sophie Nelisse, Josh Wiggins and Bill Paxton.(n)

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: An incorruptible Chicago cop launches a relentless campaign to stop a ruthless gangster plotting to take control of the city. But the detective finds himself distracted by the attentions of a seductive nightclub singer and a faceless vigilante playing both sides against the middle. Comic-strip adventure, directed by and starring Warren Beatty, with Madonna, Al Pacino and Dustin Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode.(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Broken Vows
programme.desc: A troubled, charming man spirals into a rage after being rejected by the engaged woman he seduced during a one night stand. Thriller, starring Wes Bentley, Jaimie Alexander and Cam Gigandet.(n)

programme.title: City of Tiny Lights
programme.desc: A hard-drinking private detective searches for a missing sex worker, leading to a dangerous world of religious fanaticism and political intrigue. London-set crime thriller from Dredd director Pete Travis, starring Riz Ahmed, Billie Piper and James Floyd.(n)

programme.title: Shot Caller
programme.desc: An ex con is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival squad on the streets of Southern California. Crime drama, starring Jon Bernthal, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lake Bell.(n)

programme.title: Brawl In Cell Block 99
programme.desc: A former boxer is blackmailed into performing a prison hit by a ruthless drug kingpin. Crime thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter and Don Johnson.(n)

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance.(n)

programme.title: Yakuza Apocalypse
programme.desc: A gang member is bitten by his dying vampire boss and struggles with his transition from sensitive human being to crazed bloodsucker, while also setting out to get revenge on the international crime syndicate responsible for his mentor's death. Comedy horror, starring Hayato Ichihara. In Japanese.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: An ordinary teenager is recruited by a mystical martial arts master for a vitally important quest. He must find seven magical spheres before they fall into the hands of an evil warlord, who intends to use their power to let him take over the world. Fantasy adventure based on the Japanese cartoon series, starring Justin Chatwin, Chow Yun-Fat and James Marsters.

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: Mirror Mirror
programme.desc: A princess is banished to a dark forest after the death of her father, leaving her wicked stepmother to rule over the kingdom. The exiled aristocrat joins forces with a band of rebellious dwarfs to reclaim her father's throne and stop the evil queen seducing the prince she is in love with. Fantasy, starring Julia Roberts, Lily Collins and Armie Hammer.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: A romantic novelist goes in search of her kidnapped sister in the steamy jungles of South America, only to become the target of a villainous general who demands as a ransom the valuable treasure map in her possession. Help is at hand in the form of a craggy daredevil fortune hunter, who has his eye on a share of the profits. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent survives an assassination attempt and realises something in his past has made him a target. He sets out to reunite the members of his old hit squad to find out who is trying to kill them and why, but in the process, uncovers dangerous secrets. Action thriller, with Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: An ordinary soldier is chosen to take part in a secret scientific experiment in which he and a prostitute will be placed in hibernation for one year. However, the plan goes awry and the two guinea pigs awake to find themselves in the year 2505, where they are the most intelligent people in the world and must battle to save the human race from its own stupidity. Sci-fi comedy, with Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: Howl's Moving Castle
programme.desc: A girl earns the enmity of a spiteful witch, and is placed under a curse that turns her into an old woman. Taking shelter in the walking castle of a famed wizard, she encounters the demon who enables the building to move, and who offers to dispel the enchantment - if she helps to free him. Spirited Away director Hayao Miyazaki's fantasy, based on Diana Wynne Jones' novel. With the voices of Chieko Baisho and Takuya Kimura. In Japanese.

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.sub-title: The BSL Zone: The Secret Lab and Let's Go Wild
programme.desc: Erupting volcanoes is the focus of The Secret Lab while Let's Go Wild! visits Galloway Wildlife Park to find out how scientists classify animals. (Key Stage 3).

programme.title: Coneheads
programme.desc: An alien couple and their daughter crash-land on Earth and try to blend into suburban society, all the while dodging the immigration authorities and their increasingly suspicious neighbours. Comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, Jane Curtin, Michael McKean, Jason Alexander, Michelle Burke, David Spade and Chris Farley.

programme.title: Parental Guidance
programme.desc: A busy mother turns to her parents for help in looking after her three children while she and her husband are working. However, family relations are soon strained to breaking point when it becomes clear that the two generations have very different ideas about childcare. Comedy, with Billy Crystal, Bette Midler and Marisa Tomei.

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A domesticated rare bird is taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female, but the pair are stolen by animal smugglers. He ends up lost on the streets of a strange city, and to make it back to his owner, he will have to learn to fly for the first time in his life. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg and Anne Hathaway.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: A vulcanologist's suspicions that a long-dormant volcano is about to erupt turn out to be true, prompting him to race against time to save the community standing in its way - and clash with local government officials weighing his predictions against the loss in tourism revenue. Disaster movie, starring Pierce Brosnan, Linda Hamilton, Elizabeth Hoffman and Charles Hallahan.

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: A sixtysomething confirmed bachelor finally decides to settle down with his much younger girlfriend. He and three friends decide to mark the occasion by reliving their wild youth with a trip to Las Vegas - but they find that both the city and each other have changed since their glory days. Comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Robert De Niro, Morgan Freeman and Kevin Kline.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: Two undercover agents - one working for the DEA the other for the Navy - infiltrate a drug cartel, only for the planned sting operation to go disastrously wrong. Both operatives become fugitives and must work together to survive - but both keep their true identity a secret, mistakenly thinking the other is a real criminal. Action adventure, starring Denzel Washington and Mark Wahlberg.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: Hedge-fund manager Seok-woo sets off on a train journey with his small daughter, but as their train is about to leave the station a very sick passenger stumbles aboard - affected by a chemical spill that turns creatures and people into zombies. The virus spreads fast from carriage to carriage, and Seok-woo must join with other unaffected passengers and fight to save his own life and that of his child. South Korean horror, starring Yoo Gong.

programme.title: Only Yesterday
programme.desc: A bored and frustrated woman grows weary of her humdrum life, and decides to take a break from her city job. She heads for her sister-in-law's farm and discovers deep in the countryside that her childhood memories are unfolding. Animated drama, directed by Isao Takahata, with the voices of Miki Imai and Toshiro Yanagiba. In Japanese.(n)

programme.title: A Monster in Paris
programme.desc: A would-be inventor accidentally creates a monster which escapes onto the streets of Paris. As the scientist and his sidekick try to find their creation before the police do, the creature befriends a kindly cabaret singer, who discovers he has a gentle nature and a gift for music. Animated comedy, with the voices of Vanessa Paradis and Sean Lennon.(n)

programme.title: The Cat Returns
programme.desc: A girl saves a cat's life, and is rewarded for her good deed by being whisked away to a magical land of powerful felines. Unfortunately, the King of the Cats soon sets his sights on her, and she must look to new friends to help her escape a horrible fate. Animated adventure, with the voices of Anne Hathaway, Cary Elwes, Peter Boyle and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: The inept Inspector Clouseau sets out to unmask a notorious international jewel thief believed to be behind the theft of a priceless diamond - but anarchy, as ever, follows wherever he goes. Blake Edwards' comedy sequel, starring Peter Sellers, Christopher Plummer, Catherine Schell, Herbert Lom, Burt Kwouk and Graham Stark.(n)

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomon's diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichton's novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov.(n)

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: A timid farmer abandoned by his girlfriend is fascinated by a mysterious woman who rides into his frontier town. He tries to act the part of a gunslinging Wild West hero to impress her, only to find himself facing a showdown with her notorious outlaw husband. Western spoof, directed by and starring Seth MacFarlane, with Charlize Theron and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: Seoul Station
programme.desc: Premiere. Three people work together to try to survive a rapidly spreading zombie pandemic that has been unleashed in downtown Seoul. Animated horror prequel to Train to Busan, with the voice of Seung-ryong Ryu. In Korean.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth dreads the prospect of her 13th birthday, Jason enjoys his new job as a radio presenter, and supernatural forces seem to be at work in the family home.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin is attracted to a troubled artist, who asks to paint her picture. Grandma buys a canary, but finds it refuses to sing.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: When Christmas comes around, all the Ingalls' are caught up in the secrecy and excitement. Charles and Mary take secret jobs to obtain a gift for their loved ones. Laura meanwhile is left out of the fun when she can't find anything to give or any way to raise money. While she succeeds in making the Christmas a memorable experience for everybody by selling her beloved horse Bunny to Nels Oleson so she can buy Ma a stove. Carrie remembers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels Oleson has had it up to here with Harriet's snobbish, meddlesome behaviour, particularly toward the Ingalls family. Mrs Oleson doesn't take kindly to her husband's old-school beliefs, either. The two get into a huge argument and decide to separate. This sends the Ingalls' and the Olesons' other friends to intervene and convince them to settle their differences.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd tries to help a hideously disfigured man, while Joanie excitedly makes preparations for her wedding. Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell star.

programme.title: Providence
programme.sub-title: It Was a Dark and Stormy Night
programme.desc: Syd begins to understand the source of Graham's unspeakable pain after she is stranded in a storm with him. Elsewhere, Joanie and Burt make an impulsive decision which ends in disaster. Melina Kanakardes stars.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.

programme.title: The Jazz Singer
programme.desc: A Jewish cantor's son goes against his strict father's wishes and travels to Los Angeles in search of fame and fortune. Remake of the 1927 musical drama, starring Neil Diamond in the role originally played by Al Jolson, with Laurence Olivier, Lucie Arnaz and Catlin Adams.

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird.

programme.title: Antony & Cleopatra
programme.desc: The tale of the tragic love affair between the infamous Egyptian Queen Cleopatra and Mark Antony. Historical drama, directed by and starring Charlton Heston, with Hildegard Neil and Eric Porter.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: A South African engineer is appointed general manager of a gold mine, and exposes a conspiracy to boost the price of the ore by drilling into an underground lake beneath where the company is digging, causing a devastating flood. Action adventure based on a novel by Wilbur Smith, starring Roger Moore, Susannah York, Ray Milland, Bradford Dillman and John Gielgud.

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a crooked insurance investigator is employed to steal 48 vehicles in just a few days, leading to non-stop car chases across the city. Fast-paced thriller, which was remade in 2000 with Nicolas Cage in the lead, starring HB Halicki, Marion Busia and Jerry Daugirda.

programme.title: The Triple Echo
programme.desc: Sensitively handled World War Two romance, starring Glenda Jackson and Oliver Reed. A lonely farm woman persuades an Army deserter to don drag and pose as her sister when his superior officers begin investigating his disappearance. With Brian Deacon and Jenny Lee Wright.

programme.title: The Triple Echo
programme.desc: Sensitively handled World War Two romance, starring Glenda Jackson and Oliver Reed. A lonely farm woman persuades an Army deserter to don drag and pose as her sister when his superior officers begin investigating his disappearance. With Brian Deacon and Jenny Lee Wright.

programme.title: This Sporting Life
programme.desc: A successful rugby league player's arrogant and aggressive behaviour undermines his fragile relationship with an emotionally repressed widow. As their affair comes to a bitter end, he devotes himself to the game, but the exploitation he and his fellow players endure takes its toll. Lindsay Anderson's drama, starring Richard Harris, Rachel Roberts, Alan Badel, William Hartnell, Colin Blakely and Arthur Lowe.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Verdie Foster's daughter returns home after graduating from college, and is angry to find that racial prejudice stands in the way of her getting a job. Erin seeks a job locally.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Doc Baker falls in love with Harriet Oleson's visiting niece, but fears his age may ruin his chances of a happy relationship.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Typhoid strikes an unsuspecting Walnut Grove, forcing Charles, Doc Baker and Rev Alden to work together to take care of the community's ailing residents.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie withdraws from society as the full impact of the miscarriage takes hold, and Syd attempts to persuade a recluse to have plastic surgery when she discovers he is about to be evicted.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie withdraws from society as the full impact of the miscarriage takes hold, and Syd attempts to persuade a recluse to have plastic surgery when she discovers he is about to be evicted.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Mixed Blessings
programme.desc: Three couples contemplating parenthood each encounter difficulties. Andy and Diana struggle to conceive, forcing them to consider other options, Charlie wants to be a father but his wife Beth is unconvinced, while Brad and his younger spouse Pilar have a difficult relationship with his daughter from a previous marriage. Drama, starring Bruce Greenwood and Gabrielle Carteris.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Kathy McCormick
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a woman from the wrong side of the tracks who falls for an elegant playboy and finds herself forced to lead a double life. Barbara Eden, Josh Taylor and Judy Geeson star.

programme.title: A Smile as Big as the Moon
programme.desc: A teacher of children with learning difficulties believes that his pupils will benefit from a special education programme set up at the US Space and Rocket Center for students with a gift for science. However, he faces an uphill struggle to get them accepted onto the course. Fact-based drama, starring John Corbett and Jessy Schram.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben enters a photo of Erin in a contest, but does not realise what they intend to do with it. Curt's death makes Mary Ellen become over-protective of her son.

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: A couple vanish after spending the night in a supposedly haunted house - then Ironside suddenly disappears. The rest of the team have to figure out what happened and who is behind it. Police drama with the wheelchair-using cop, starring Raymond Burr.

programme.title: Hidden Crimes
programme.desc: A woman receives a message from her imprisoned brother which turns out to be the first in a series of clues. She follows the trail in search of the millions he stole from a bank, but finds his murderous partners in crime are also looking for the money. Thriller, starring Tricia Helfer and Jonathan Scarfe.

She follows the trail in search of the millions he stole from a bank, but finds his murderous partners in crime are also looking for the money. Thriller, starring Tricia Helfer and Jonathan Scarfe.

programme.title: Ring of Deceit
programme.desc: An art expert examines an antique ring belonging to a patron of her museum, who claims it has been in his family for years. She discovers a connection between the ring and a recent killing, and begins to wonder if the owner may not be as innocent as he appears. Thriller, starring Rebecca Mader and Cameron Bancroft.

programme.title: Ring of Deceit
programme.desc: An art expert examines an antique ring belonging to a patron of her museum, who claims it has been in his family for years. She discovers a connection between the ring and a recent killing, and begins to wonder if the owner may not be as innocent as he appears. Thriller, starring Rebecca Mader and Cameron Bancroft.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: First of a two-part drama about the legendary son of Zeus. The Princess of Thebes falls pregnant by the chief of the gods. Once born, the child is made to feel an outcast as he is rejected by his mother, envied by brother Iphicles and the target of a revenge plot by Zeus's wife Hera. Forced into exile, Hercules agrees to a series of tasks to redeem himself. With Paul Telfer, Elizabeth Perkins, Timothy Dalton and Luke Ford.

programme.title: Stephen King's It
programme.desc: First of a two-part adaptation of the best-selling horror novel. A youngster's murder alerts seven friends that a supernatural enemy they fought as children has returned. After 30 years apart, the reluctant heroes must overcome their worst fears and find the courage to defeat the inhuman force. Starring Tim Curry, Richard Thomas, Tim Reid, John Ritter and Olivia Hussey.

programme.title: Dirty Pictures
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, telling the story of the curator of an art gallery put on trial for breaching obscenity laws after displaying the sexually explicit work of photographer Robert Mapplethorpe. Starring James Woods, Ann Marin, Craig T Nelson and Diana Scarwid.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth is not happy when Grandma is visited by an old flame, while Jim-Bob persuades Yancy to use his talents to make fuel instead of moonshine.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The townsfolk are stunned by news of the attack on Pearl Harbour, while Mary Ellen receives word that her husband has been killed.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A travelling medicine salesman arrives in town claiming to be able to heal anything, but he faces condemnation when Mrs Oleson becomes seriously ill. Red Buttons guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Walnut Grove community intervenes after a badly beaten boy is found unconscious on the floor of his cabin, the victim of his father's drunken rage.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd meets a mysterious man who claims to be her father, while Jim treats a dog that refuses to eat. Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell star.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd's love life improves after she meets a single father, but their relationship is shaken when she finds out he has a heart condition that causes him to have blackouts.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's No Greater Love
programme.desc: A woman endures a seemingly endless series of personal trials and traumas after her parents are killed on the Titanic, but carries on struggling to keep her family together. Period drama, starring Kelly Rutherford, Chris Sarandon, Simon MacCorkindale and Michael Landes.(n)

programme.title: The Engagement Ring
programme.desc: When a missing engagement ring turns up 40 years after it was lost, its appearance opens old wounds but also prompts a new romance to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Patricia Heaton, Vincent Spano, Tony Lo Bianco and David Hunt.(n)

programme.title: My Father, My Son
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a US Navy Admiral's decision to use the Agent Orange defoliant during the Vietnam campaign - and the bitter realisation that it may have caused the cancer subsequently contracted by his soldier son. Starring Karl Malden, Keith Carradine, Dirk Blocker, Grace Zabriskie and Jenny Lewis.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth has to look after the store after Ike suffers a heart attack, while Ben and Jim Bob go into the molasses business.(n)

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: Fran discovers that her maid is an illegal immigrant, opening up a disturbing underworld of human slavery. When two people are found dead, Ironside investigates. Raymond Burr stars.(n)

programme.title: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: A woman leaves her peaceful suburban home for New York to settle the affairs of her best friend, who has been murdered. She discovers there may have been more to the killing than the official explanation suggests - and realises her own life is also in danger. Mystery, starring Kristanna Loken and Warren Christie.(n)

Starring Tim Curry, Richard Thomas, Tim Reid, John Ritter and Olivia Hussey.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke.(n)

programme.title: Saved by the Light
programme.desc: An American grocer is hit by lightning and suffers massive trauma, but undergoes a radical change in personality as he recovers, eventually becoming a gifted faith healer. Fact-based drama, starring Eric Roberts, Lynette Walden and Don Harvey.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth dreads the prospect of her 13th birthday, Jason enjoys his new job as a radio presenter, and supernatural forces seem to be at work in the family home.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin is attracted to a troubled artist, who asks to paint her picture. Grandma buys a canary, but finds it refuses to sing.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: When Christmas comes around, all the Ingalls' are caught up in the secrecy and excitement. Charles and Mary take secret jobs to obtain a gift for their loved ones. Laura meanwhile is left out of the fun when she can't find anything to give or any way to raise money. While she succeeds in making the Christmas a memorable experience for everybody by selling her beloved horse Bunny to Nels Oleson so she can buy Ma a stove. Carrie remembers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels Oleson has had it up to here with Harriet's snobbish, meddlesome behaviour, particularly toward the Ingalls family. Mrs Oleson doesn't take kindly to her husband's old-school beliefs, either. The two get into a huge argument and decide to separate. This sends the Ingalls' and the Olesons' other friends to intervene and convince them to settle their differences.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd tries to help a hideously disfigured man, while Joanie excitedly makes preparations for her wedding. Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell star.

programme.title: Providence
programme.sub-title: It Was a Dark and Stormy Night
programme.desc: Syd begins to understand the source of Graham's unspeakable pain after she is stranded in a storm with him. Elsewhere, Joanie and Burt make an impulsive decision which ends in disaster. Melina Kanakardes stars.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.

programme.title: The Jazz Singer
programme.desc: A Jewish cantor's son goes against his strict father's wishes and travels to Los Angeles in search of fame and fortune. Remake of the 1927 musical drama, starring Neil Diamond in the role originally played by Al Jolson, with Laurence Olivier, Lucie Arnaz and Catlin Adams.

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird.

programme.title: Antony & Cleopatra
programme.desc: The tale of the tragic love affair between the infamous Egyptian Queen Cleopatra and Mark Antony. Historical drama, directed by and starring Charlton Heston, with Hildegard Neil and Eric Porter.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: A South African engineer is appointed general manager of a gold mine, and exposes a conspiracy to boost the price of the ore by drilling into an underground lake beneath where the company is digging, causing a devastating flood. Action adventure based on a novel by Wilbur Smith, starring Roger Moore, Susannah York, Ray Milland, Bradford Dillman and John Gielgud.

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a crooked insurance investigator is employed to steal 48 vehicles in just a few days, leading to non-stop car chases across the city. Fast-paced thriller, which was remade in 2000 with Nicolas Cage in the lead, starring HB Halicki, Marion Busia and Jerry Daugirda.

programme.title: The Triple Echo
programme.desc: Sensitively handled World War Two romance, starring Glenda Jackson and Oliver Reed. A lonely farm woman persuades an Army deserter to don drag and pose as her sister when his superior officers begin investigating his disappearance. With Brian Deacon and Jenny Lee Wright.

programme.title: This Sporting Life
programme.desc: A successful rugby league player's arrogant and aggressive behaviour undermines his fragile relationship with an emotionally repressed widow. As their affair comes to a bitter end, he devotes himself to the game, but the exploitation he and his fellow players endure takes its toll. Lindsay Anderson's drama, starring Richard Harris, Rachel Roberts, Alan Badel, William Hartnell, Colin Blakely and Arthur Lowe.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Verdie Foster's daughter returns home after graduating from college, and is angry to find that racial prejudice stands in the way of her getting a job. Erin seeks a job locally.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Doc Baker falls in love with Harriet Oleson's visiting niece, but fears his age may ruin his chances of a happy relationship.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Typhoid strikes an unsuspecting Walnut Grove, forcing Charles, Doc Baker and Rev Alden to work together to take care of the community's ailing residents.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie withdraws from society as the full impact of the miscarriage takes hold, and Syd attempts to persuade a recluse to have plastic surgery when she discovers he is about to be evicted.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Mixed Blessings
programme.desc: Three couples contemplating parenthood each encounter difficulties. Andy and Diana struggle to conceive, forcing them to consider other options, Charlie wants to be a father but his wife Beth is unconvinced, while Brad and his younger spouse Pilar have a difficult relationship with his daughter from a previous marriage. Drama, starring Bruce Greenwood and Gabrielle Carteris.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Kathy McCormick
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a woman from the wrong side of the tracks who falls for an elegant playboy and finds herself forced to lead a double life. Barbara Eden, Josh Taylor and Judy Geeson star.

programme.title: A Smile as Big as the Moon
programme.desc: A teacher of children with learning difficulties believes that his pupils will benefit from a special education programme set up at the US Space and Rocket Center for students with a gift for science. However, he faces an uphill struggle to get them accepted onto the course. Fact-based drama, starring John Corbett and Jessy Schram.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben enters a photo of Erin in a contest, but does not realise what they intend to do with it. Curt's death makes Mary Ellen become over-protective of her son.

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: A couple vanish after spending the night in a supposedly haunted house - then Ironside suddenly disappears. The rest of the team have to figure out what happened and who is behind it. Police drama with the wheelchair-using cop, starring Raymond Burr.

programme.title: Hidden Crimes
programme.desc: A woman receives a message from her imprisoned brother which turns out to be the first in a series of clues. She follows the trail in search of the millions he stole from a bank, but finds his murderous partners in crime are also looking for the money. Thriller, starring Tricia Helfer and Jonathan Scarfe.

Forced into exile, Hercules agrees to a series of tasks to redeem himself. With Paul Telfer, Elizabeth Perkins, Timothy Dalton and Luke Ford.

programme.desc: Fact-based drama, telling the story of the curator of an art gallery put on trial for breaching obscenity laws after displaying the sexually explicit work of photographer Robert Mapplethorpe. Starring James Woods, Ann Marin, Craig T Nelson and Diana Scarwid.(n)

programme.desc: A woman endures a seemingly endless series of personal trials and traumas after her parents are killed on the Titanic, but carries on struggling to keep her family together. Period drama, starring Kelly Rutherford, Chris Sarandon, Simon MacCorkindale and Michael Landes.(n)

programme.title: The Engagement Ring
programme.desc: When a missing engagement ring turns up 40 years after it was lost, its appearance opens old wounds but also prompts a new romance to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Patricia Heaton, Vincent Spano, Tony Lo Bianco and David Hunt.(n)

programme.title: My Father, My Son
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a US Navy Admiral's decision to use the Agent Orange defoliant during the Vietnam campaign - and the bitter realisation that it may have caused the cancer subsequently contracted by his soldier son. Starring Karl Malden, Keith Carradine, Dirk Blocker, Grace Zabriskie and Jenny Lewis.(n)

programme.desc: Elizabeth has to look after the store after Ike suffers a heart attack, while Ben and Jim Bob go into the molasses business.(n)

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Deep in the forests of the Pacific Northwest, isolated from society, a devoted father (Viggo Mortensen) dedicates his life to transforming his six young children into extraordinary adults. But when tragedy strikes the family, they are forced to leave this self-created paradise and begin a journey into the outside world that challenges his idea of what it means to be a parent and brings into question everything he's taught them.

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Alice Kinney who is recently separated from her husband. Alice decides to start over by moving back to her hometown of Los Angeles with her two young daughters. During a night out on her 40th birthday, Alice meets three aspiring filmmakers who happen to be in need of a place to live. Alice agrees to let the guys stay in her guest house temporarily, but the arrangement ends up unfolding in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: If I Leave Here Tomorrow
programme.desc: Featuring rare interviews and never-before-seen archive, this documentary takes viewers on a trip through the history, myth and legend of the greatest American rock band ever. Rising from the swamps of the Deep South, the good ol' boys from Jacksonville, FL came to define an era with their hard rocking boogie-woogie sound, their drunken and dangerous antics and their controversial use of the rebel flag. The film also serves as a portrait of band leader Ronnie Van Zant.

programme.title: Jeff Lynne's ELO: Wembley Or Bust
programme.desc: Filmed live at Wembley Stadium with an audience of 80,000, ELO performs hit-after-hit in an evening filled with music, magic and spaceships. Fronted by music legend Jeff Lynne, the band's joy has the crowd roaring to the Wembley rafters with delight. The set list includes Xanadu, Last Train To London, Standin' In The Rain and all of ELO's greatest hits including Evil Woman, Showdown, Telephone Line, Don't Bring Me Down, Mr Blue Sky, Livin' Thing, Handle With Care, Sweet Talkin' Woman and 10538 Overture. Directed by Paul Dugdale.

programme.title: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Seven college housemates from the 1960s who have drifted apart must now reunite for the funeral of a friend. Having entered adulthood as non-conformists, most now belong to the establishment. Harold (Kevin Kline) has grown up to be a running-shoe magnate; Michael (Jeff Goldblum), a gossip magazine journalist; Sam (Tom Berenger), TV's hottest private eye; and Nick (William Hurt), a drug dealer. Among the women, Sarah (Glenn Close) is a doctor; Meg (Mary Kay Place), a lawyer; and Karen (Jobeth Williams), a wife and mother in the suburbs.

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: Once a year, fourteen-year-old David (Josh Wiggins) travels from his mother's home in Texas to visit his loner father, Cal (Matt Bomer), in the remote mountains of Montana. There, the two embark on their annual hunting excursion, during which the taciturn Cal attempts to connect with his smartphone-addicted son. But when a terrifying turn of events leaves Cal critically wounded, it's up to the teenage David to summon enough strength for both of them.

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A squadron of vengeful, Nazi-killing Allied soldiers becomes embroiled in a plot to firebomb a Parisian movie theater hosting a film premiere that Adolf Hitler plans to attend in this comically violent World War II action smash starring Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger and Oscar® winner Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: In the 1950's, a talented quarterback (Brendan Fraser) from a working class Jewish family earns a scholarship to a prestigious New England prep school, but must keep his religious faith a secret from his blue blood classmates. Matt Damon and Amy Locane costar in this period drama.

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.

programme.title: Militarization
programme.desc: Our Cartoon President militarizes the government and launches a military parade with National Security Advisor John Bolton's help while Sean Hannity reshapes his cable news network in his aggressive image. Season finale.(c)

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: Amanda Seyfried ('Red Riding Hood') stars in this intense thriller about a desperate young woman who, after being ignored by the police, is forced to go on the hunt alone for a maniacal serial killer whom she believes has kidnapped her younger sister.

programme.title: Who Is America?: 107
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation. Season finale.

programme.title: All I See Is You
programme.desc: After being blinded as a child in a nearly fatal car crash that claimed her parent's lives, Gina depends on her husband James to be her eyes. She sees her world in her own imagination with help from James' descriptions. Despite her disability, the two enjoy a colorful existence in Thailand. It seems the only real hardship this loving couple faces is difficulty conceiving a child, but when Gina is given the opportunity to have a corneal transplant and regains her vision, their life and relationship are upended.

programme.title: Changeling
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this drama in which Academy Award winner Angelina Jolie's kidnapped son is found alive. She realizes that the child returned to her is not her own. She faces corrupt police and a skeptical public in her relentless pursuit of answers, only to be confronted by a truth that will change her forever. Set in 1920s Los Angeles, the film also stars Academy Award nominee John Malkovich.

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: Amanda Seyfried ('Red Riding Hood') stars in this intense thriller about a desperate young woman who, after being ignored by the police, is forced to go on the hunt alone for a maniacal serial killer whom she believes has kidnapped her younger sister.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.

programme.title: Home Of The Brave
programme.desc: Three soldiers returning home to Spokane, Washington from the Iraq War find the adjustment back to normal life anything but smooth in this heartbreaking drama starring Samuel L. Jackson, Jessica Biel, Brian Presley, Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, Jeff Nordling and Christina Ricci.

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A lawyer becomes the target of a corrupt politician and his NSA operatives when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated murder. Starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Regina King.

programme.title: Freeway
programme.desc: Vanessa Lutz is a teenage juvenile delinquent living with her prostitute mother and perverted stepfather. Attempting to flee her life, she leaves to go live with her grandmother. While on her way, she meets Bob Wolverton, a charming yet sadistic serial killer. Fearing for her life, she attempts to kill Bob, but only severely disfigures him. Vanessa is sent to prison due to a lack of evidence. Now she must escape and clear her name before he can strike again.

programme.title: The Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: An ambitious young journalist (Evan Peters) embeds himself with a dangerous band of pirates in Somalia to get an unfiltered investigative perspective, but his inexperience threatens to derail his plans.

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: This movie chronicles the journey of a group of enslaved Africans who overtake their captor's ship and attempt to return to their beloved homeland. When the ship is seized, the captives are brought to the United States where they are charged with murder and await their fate in prison. A courtroom battle ensues that captures the attention of the entire nation. For the men and woman on trial, it's simply a fight for the basic right of freedom. Directed by Steven Spielberg.

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A lawyer becomes the target of a corrupt politician and his NSA operatives when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated murder. Starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Regina King.

programme.title: Halloween II (2009)
programme.desc: It's nearly Halloween again and the terrorized Laurie Strode awaits the dreaded return of her murderous brother Michael in this sequel remake starring Scout Taylor-Compton, Malcolm McDowell and Taylor Mane.(n)

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.(n)

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).(n)

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: If I Leave Here Tomorrow

The film also serves as a portrait of band leader Ronnie Van Zant.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in this lavish historical drama as German aristocrat Claus von Stauffenberg, a formerly loyal Nazi officer who begins to question his country's motivations and tactics in World War II then hatches a dangerous plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler. Bill Nighy and Kenneth Branagh costar in this fact-based thriller.(n)

programme.title: Lord of War
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this drama thriller as Yuri Orlov, a Russian immigrant who becomes a millionaire in the Eighties and Nineties by reselling weapons from his politically crumbling homeland to "hot spot" regions around the world, all while marrying a beautiful woman (Bridget Moynahan), dodging a determined federal agent (Ethan Hawke), and occasionally facing the immorality of his chosen profession. Jared Leto and Ian Holm costar in this film from writer/director Andrew Niccol ("Gattaca," "The Truman Show").(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: In 1940, long before he sits on the US Supreme Court or claimed victory in Brown v. Board of Education, Thurgood Marshall (Chadwick Boseman) is a young rabble-rousing attorney for the NAACP. Marshall explores one his greatest challenges in those early days: the case of black chauffeur Joseph Spell (Sterling K. Brown), accused by his white employer, Eleanor Strubing (Kate Hudson), of sexual assault and attempted murder.(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Jess and Leslie couldn't be more different—she's rich, he's poor, she's from the city, he's from the country—but when Leslie begins to open up the world of imagination to Jess, they find they have something amazing to share: the kingdom of Terabithia, a realm of giants, ogres and other enchanted beings that can only be accessed by boldly swinging across a stream in the woods on a strand of rope. Here, Leslie and Jess rule as King and Queen among the incredible creatures they create, and not even the forces of evil can break their bond.(n)

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: A pair of horny American college students on a backpacking trip across Europe stumble into a hellish nightmare of murder for profit in this horror smash from director Eli Roth ("Cabin Fever"), starring Jay Hernandez and Derek Richardson, with Eythor Gudjonsson, Barbara Nedeljakova, Jan Vlasak, Jana Kaderabkova and Jennifer Lim.

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.

programme.title: Dude Bro Party Massacre III
programme.desc: Brent enters the halls of the Delta Bi Theta fraternity. He isn't just any pledge, he's a legacy - and it's a legacy of death. Brent is actually there to solve the mystery of his identical twin brother Brock's murder, and he'll do anything to crack the case, including an attempt at the frat's most daring prank of all time. After the prank causes two commercial jets to collide over an orphanage, they're punished to a weekend at The Old Sorority House by the Lake. But they're not the only ones there, a killer named Motherface lurks nearby.

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.

programme.title: King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Facing defeat, Merlin banishes the evil enchantress Morgana and her son to the ends of universe. Vowing revenge, Morgana and her son return to Earth, hell-bent on destroying every last descendant of King Arthur and his Knights.

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity.

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic.

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all.

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems.

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley.

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all.

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.

programme.title: 7 Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: A team of scientists made up of Jia (Li Bingbing), Ridley (Kellan Lutz), and Mason (Kelsey Grammer) are in search for a lost colleague in an ancient labyrinth. Before it's too late, the group must battle their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating funnel web spiders and find out what is behind the arachnids' power and intelligence used to protect a secret powerful elixir.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: When a prominent politician and a beautiful young woman vanish inside a London subway station, Scotland Yard's Inspector Calhoun investigates and makes a horrifying discovery. Not only did a group of 19th century tunnel workers survive a cave-in, but they lived for years in a secret underground enclave by consuming the flesh of their own dead. Now the lone descendant of this grisly tribe has surfaced, prowling the streets for fresh victims and a new mate.(n)

programme.title: Black Christmas (1974)
programme.desc: Classic slasher film in which a group of sorority sisters are stalked by an unwelcome guest during the Christmas break.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead.(n)

programme.title: God Told Me To
programme.desc: A desperate man targets a wealthy family's home to steal from. He picks the wrong night to carry out his plans however, for a masked madman has gotten there first, imprisoned the family and lined the mansion with deadly traps.(n)

programme.title: The Lair of the White Worm
programme.desc: Archaeologist Angus Flint is staying at Mercy Farm, in the heart of England's Peak district. He is the guest of Mary and Eve Trent, two sisters who were orphaned when their parents mysteriously vanished. While excavating their garden for a paper he is writing, he unearths a prehistoric skull of indeterminate age and species, and unleashes an unspeakable evil on the countryside. When the skull is stolen by nearby resident Lady Sylvia Marsh, all of their lives are caught in a threatening web of pagan terror, savage rituals and crawling horror.(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.(n)

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.(n)

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: Adam Hitchens is a London-based conservationist, husband and father who has found himself struggling amidst fraught economic pressures at work. He decides to move his family from London to Ireland and to take a job surveying an Irish forest. He moves his family to a millhouse deep in the idyllic countryside of Ireland. When the family arrives, they get to work rebuilding their new home. They meet their neighbors, but not everyone approves of their arrival. The locals are unfriendly and begin to make them feel unwanted.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Facing defeat, Merlin banishes the evil enchantress Morgana and her son to the ends of universe. Vowing revenge, Morgana and her son return to Earth, hell-bent on destroying every last descendant of King Arthur and his Knights.(n)

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have.(n)

programme.title: Sleepwalkers
programme.desc: Tanya (Mädchen Amick) is a sexually curious virgin who falls for Charles (Brian Krause), the new boy in school, only to learn too late that he's a life-sucking sleepwalker. Charles and his mother, Mary (Alice Krige), are the last of a dying breed who are able to stay alive by feeding on the life force of young women. Able to mutate at will, they roam the Earth, forever fleeing discovery while searching for the next victim.(n)

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientist performs experiments involving intelligence enhancing drugs and virtual reality on a simple-minded gardener. The gardener is put on an extensive schedule of learning and quickly becomes brilliant. He has a few ideas of his own on how the research should continue and the scientist begins losing control of his experiment.(n)

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door.(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought.(n)

programme.title: Pork Pie
programme.desc: A trio of accidental outlaws travel the length of New Zealand in a yellow Mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy hot in their pursuit.

programme.title: 68 Kill
programme.desc: Trailer-dwelling, sewage-pumping Chip (Matthew Gray Gubler) has got one thing going for him: he's head over heels infatuated with his girlfriend Liza (AnnaLynne McCord). He's more than willing to overlook her wild streak—the fact that she's hooking up with their landlord; her rather extreme mood swings —so when she proposes a plot to steal $68,000, he goes along with the plan. But when what was supposed to be a simple heist turns into an off-the-rails, blood-spattered crime spree.

programme.title: Slow Burn (2007)
programme.desc: A district attorney who's running for mayor suddenly finds himself embroiled in a case of murder and financial corruption in this edgy thriller starring Ray Liotta, LL Cool J, Jolene Blalock, Mekhi Phifer, Taye Diggs and Chewitel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path.

programme.title: Gary Owen: I Got My Associates
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Gary Owen shares stories of being married to the daughter of a founding member of the Black Panthers, being the father of young teenagers and, of course, his hillbilly family. Filmed at the Stardome in Hoover, Alabama, the special also includes Gary recounting his time in the military, celebrity weddings and bumping into Lebron James in the bathroom.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life.
