programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.(n)

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic.(n)

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.(n)

programme.title: Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work
programme.desc: This insightful, hysterically funny documentary follows comedienne Joan Rivers through a year of her life while looking back on her groundbreaking, barrier-breaking career as one of the first women to make a name for herself in the tough, male-dominated world of show business.(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.(n)

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.(n)

programme.title: Crunchy Ice
programme.desc: Tara's other alters begin to disappear leaving only Bryce, who takes over Marshall's room and wreaks havoc on the Gregson family; Marshall moves in temporarily with his grandmother and mourns the loss of Lionel; Kate spends more time in St. Louis with Evan; Neil pressures Charmaine to move to Houston with him.(n)

programme.title: The Good Parts
programme.desc: Everyone prepares to leave for uncharted waters as Tara and Max decide to go to Boston for help from the expert recommended by Dr. Hattaras; Neil and Charmaine prepare to move to Houston; Kate receives a life-changing proposal from Evan; Marshall considers the future of his education.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work
programme.desc: This insightful, hysterically funny documentary follows comedienne Joan Rivers through a year of her life while looking back on her groundbreaking, barrier-breaking career as one of the first women to make a name for herself in the tough, male-dominated world of show business.(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees.(n)

programme.title: Requiem for a Heavyweight
programme.desc: A boxer at the end of his career has never taken a dive but is pressured to do so by his sleazy manager, who has bet against him in an upcoming bout.

programme.title: The Secret of Santa Vittoria
programme.desc: Italian villagers, led by their vino-loving mayor, celebrate the death of Mussolini, but then must try to outwit Nazis who are determined to plunder the town's vast store of wine.

programme.title: The Twenty-Fifth Hour
programme.desc: A Romanian peasant experiences the horrors of World War II when the Nazis invade his country and he is falsely labeled a Jew and sent to a work camp.

programme.title: La Strada
programme.desc: Federico Fellini's Oscar-winning Best Foreign Language Film is the tale of the relationship between a brutish carnival strongman and his simpleminded assistant as they tour the Italian countryside.

programme.title: Deaf Smith and Johnny Ears
programme.desc: Spaghetti western about a mercenary (Anthony Quinn) and his pal who fight a would-be dictator in 1834 Texas. Johnny Ears: Franco Nero. Susie: Pamela Tiffin. Morton: Franco Graziosi. Originally titled "Los Amigos." Directed by Paolo Cavara.

programme.title: Tomorrow the World!
programme.desc: Story of an American couple (Fredric March, Betty Field) who adopt a Nazi-indoctrinated German boy (Skippy Homeier). Agnes Moorehead, Joan Carroll. Excellent performances. Leslie Fenton directed.

programme.title: Our Vines Have Tender Grapes
programme.desc: A Norwegian father endeavors to raise his daughter with love and learning in a Wisconsin farming community during World War II.

programme.title: Scandal at Scourie
programme.desc: Religious and political conflicts arise in a Canadian town after a Protestant couple adopt an orphaned Catholic girl.

programme.title: Without Honor
programme.desc: Tale of adultery and a man's bitter hatred for his sister-in-law. Laraine Day. Dennis: Franchot Tone. Bill: Dane Clark. Katherine: Agnes Moorehead. Fred: Bruce Bennett. Good cast defeated by an overly contrived script. Irving Pichel directed.

programme.title: Meet Me in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Romance between a rancher (Dan Dailey) and a dancer (Cyd Charisse), with cameos as the jackpot. Agnes Moorehead. Sari: Lili Darvas. Tom: Jim Backus. Roy Rowland directed.

programme.title: Caged
programme.desc: Contact with criminals in a prison transforms a young woman into an embittered convict, where she fights to survive among brutal and hardened inmates. Eleanor Parker was nominated for Best Actress as the imprisoned woman and Hope Emerson received a Best Supporting Actress nod as the institution's sadistic matron. The screenplay was also Oscar nominated.

programme.title: Citizen Kane
programme.desc: After a multimillionaire newspaper magnate utters the mysterious name "Rosebud" on his deathbed, reporters scramble to decipher the word's meaning, touching off a fascinating series of flashbacks on his life, career and relationships. Orson Welles cowrote (and shared the Best Original Screenplay Oscar with Herman J. Mankiewicz), produced, directed and stars as Kane.

programme.title: Journey into Fear
programme.desc: Thriller about a U.S. engineer (Joseph Cotten) menaced by Nazi agents aboard a Greek cargo ship. Josette: Dolores Del Rio. Stephanie: Ruth Warrick. Mrs. Mathews: Agnes Moorehead. Haki: Orson Welles. Gogo: Jack Durant. Kopeikin: Everett Sloane. Haller: Eustace Wyatt. Captain: Richard Bennett. Intriguing despite a flawed and stylized treatment. Produced by Orson Welles. Screenplay by Welles and Joseph Cotten. Directed by Norman Foster (and uncredited Welles).

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: Orson Welles' follow-up to "Citizen Kane" is this Best Picture nominee, an epic tale of the gradual decline of an old-monied Indianapolis family in the face of turn-of-the-century industrialization. The Ambersons' magnificent lives are apparent as the film opens, as is their sense of propriety. Welles, who directed, produced and adapted the screenplay from Booth Tarkington's novel, also provides the narration. Remade as a 2002 made-for-cable film. (cc).

programme.title: Mrs. Parkington
programme.desc: A Nevada maid falls in love with and marries an ambitious mine owner, but when he moves them to a palatial estate in New York, they are spurned by Manhattan society. Greer Garson was nominated for Best Actress as the title character, while Agnes Moorehead received a nod as Best Supporting Actress.

programme.title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
programme.desc: A faded Southern belle with a horrible secret in her past goes to the brink of insanity following the arrival of her seemingly sweet-tempered cousin after spending years as a recluse in her decaying mansion.

programme.title: Johnny Belinda
programme.desc: Jane Wyman won an Oscar for her portrayal of a deaf woman living a hardscrabble life in a Nova Scotia fishing village, where she is taught to communicate by a young doctor. Later, she is raped by a local lout, and charged when he is later found murdered. The film was nominated for 12 Oscars, including Best Picture, Director (Jean Negulesco) and Actor (Lew Ayres), but Wyman's was the only win.

programme.title: The Big Street
programme.desc: A callous Broadway showgirl is adored by a naive nightclub busboy, who gets the chance to prove his love to her when he's injured.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: Greta Garbo's last silent film: a melodrama centered on a woman whose love for an ex-boyfriend (Conrad Nagel) is squelched by her jealous husband (Anders Randolf) and a college boy (Lew Ayres). Durant: George Davis. Lassalle: Holmes Herbert.

programme.title: Doorway to Hell
programme.desc: Underworld melodrama about the rise and fall of gangster Louis Ricarno (Lew Ayres). James Cagney is a stand-out as his double-crossing pal. Dorothy Mathews, Charles Judels, Leon Janney, Robert Elliott. Directed by Archie Mayo.

programme.title: Spring Madness
programme.desc: Shenanigans involving a Harvard youth with wanderlust and a local college student vying for the affection of the same woman.

programme.title: Remember?
programme.desc: A couple's marriage is troubled by the husband's workaholic nature, but their union gets a fresh start from a loss-of-memory potion that is provided to them by a mutual friend, who hopes they can happily get back together.

programme.title: Young Dr. Kildare
programme.desc: This initial entry in the series has the young physician wrestling with whether to join his father's small-town practice or take an internship at a tough New York City hospital.

programme.title: Calling Dr. Kildare
programme.desc: When a young hoodlum is shot, his sister (Lana Turner) urges Kildare (Lew Ayres) to operate without filing a police report. Lionel Barrymore. Mary: Laraine Day. Molly: Alma Kruger. Alice: Lynne Carver. Standard. Directed by Harold S. Bucquet.

programme.title: The Unfaithful
programme.desc: While her husband is away, a housewife kills an intruder, who just happens to be her own former lover, leading to a web of secrets and betrayal.

programme.title: Advise and Consent
programme.desc: Adaptation of Allen Drury's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel chronicles the various political machinations set in motion during the confirmation hearings involving the appointment of a controversial Secretary of State. Drury served as technical adviser on the film.

programme.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
programme.desc: Restored version of director Lewis Milestone's early sound classic about German youth experiencing the horrors of World War I. Paul: Lew Ayres. Kat: Louis Wolheim. Himmelstoss: John Wray. Tjaden: George "Slim" Summerville. Kemmerich: Ben Alexander.(n)

programme.title: The Last Train from Madrid
programme.desc: Intrigue on a train, concerning people escaping the Spanish Civil War. Dorothy Lamour. Dexter: Lew Ayres. De Soto: Gilbert Roland. Baroness: Karen Morley. Juan: Robert Cummings. Helena: Helen Mack. Commandante: Lionel Atwill. Maria: Olympe Bradna. Balk: Lee Bowman. Alvarez: Anthony Quinn. Interesting cast of rising stars. Directed by James Hogan.(n)

programme.title: These Glamour Girls
programme.desc: A dance-hall beauty faces coed snobbery when she accepts an invitation to a college dance issued by a drunken student.(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: A woman and a songwriter who are both implicated in a playboy's murder team up to track down the actual killer in San Francisco.(n)

programme.title: Fingers at the Window
programme.desc: An actor and a threatened dancer track down the reason for a series of ax murders.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Fleecing
programme.desc: An insurance salesman gets mixed up with gangsters.(n)

programme.title: Dark Passage
programme.desc: Film-noir thriller about a husband, falsely imprisoned for the murder of his wife, who escapes from jail to track down the actual murderer, but first must hide out in a woman's apartment while he recovers from plastic surgery on his face.(n)

programme.title: Bacall on Bogart
programme.desc: The life and career of Humphrey Bogart. Lauren Bacall hosts.(n)

programme.title: To Have and Have Not
programme.desc: In World War II Martinique, a charter-boat owner agrees to a smuggling deal in an effort to help an attractive pickpocket get back to America. Later, when his first mate is taken hostage and pumped for information, the skipper must come to his rescue. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Blood Alley
programme.desc: An American sailor breaks out of a Chinese prison and fights his way to Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Young Man with a Horn
programme.desc: The life of Bix Beiderbecke inspired this tale of a musician's rise.(n)

programme.title: Sex and the Single Girl
programme.desc: A magazine writer sets out to expose a sex-research psychologist who has written a successful book for single women, but first he has to score an interview.(n)

programme.title: Designing Woman
programme.desc: A sportswriter and a fashion designer meet on vacation and marry on spur-of-the-moment. But they have to get to know each other when they come back to reality.(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company, and unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO. (cc).

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: A political consultant in the midst of a bitter divorce attempts to delicately divulge the truth about his past relationships to his curious young daughter, who simply won't stop asking questions until she's satisfied with all the answers. (cc).

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely turnstile clerk saves a man who has fallen onto the tracks, then poses as the comatose man's fiancée to gain access to his condition. (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives investigate a hit-and-run in which the victim is an ex-con (David Groh) recently released after serving 15 years for killing his daughter. Dann Florek has a cameo as Capt. Cragen. Fontana: Dennis Farina. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Bloodstains in an apartment that belonged to a young couple with a baby leads to the separated parents, each of whom claims that the other has the infant. Amy: Tessa Ghylin. Carla Tyrell: Donna Murphy. Jimmy: Michael C. Williams. Judge Steinman: Susan Blommaert. Helene Beltran: Peggy Roeder. Carmichael: Angie Harmon. McCoy: Sam Waterston. Schiff: Steven Hill. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the shooting of a mystery writer (Ruthie Henshall) and the death of her accountant. Dean Tyler: Tom Berenger. Carolyn Tyler: Linda Emond. programme.desc: After the bodies of two teens are found, the detectives trace their identities and learn that one of them had a sister who was traveling with the girls. Stabler: Chris Meloni. Martin. McCoy: Sam Waterston. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters team up with the spirit of their grandmother to battle a ghostly demon who wants to resurrect himself by feeding off the energy of magical creatures. Elsewhere, Paige uses a truth spell on a new boyfriend and discovers that he is married and has kids. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: In Part 1 of two, centuries-old Greek Titans are released from their imprisonment by a witless demon, and they soon set out to kill the elders responsible for their confinement. Meanwhile, Paige has apocalyptic dreams that she fears are warnings of a major disaster in the real world. Chris: Drew Fuller. Cronus: Brian Thompson. Demetrius: Will Kempe. Meta: Lisa Thornhill. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: In the conclusion of a two-part episode, the sisters are turned into goddesses in order to do battle with the Titans, but they have trouble adjusting to their new abilities and desires, which endangers their mission. Meanwhile, the Titans continue to hunt for more elders to slaughter. Chris: Drew Fuller. Cronus: Brian Thompson. Demetrius: Will Kempe. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a series of murders at their old high school. The probe leads the two to recall how Sam was the target of a bully at school, while Dean was the big man on campus. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: A seductive siren compels three men to murder their wives in a small Iowa town. Sam and Dean investigate and fall under her spell, leading them to engage in a battle against one another. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean visit a small town where people are cheating death because the Reapers have vanished. They journey into the spiritual world for answers and learn who is behind the Reapers' disappearance. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: On the Head of a Pin
programme.desc: Someone is using Lucifer's sword to kill angels. Castiel and Uriel ask Dean to use the torturing skills he learned in hell to obtain information from a likely suspect. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan is shot while working late at the lab, but her condition is further complicated by logic-defying visions of her deceased mother. Meanwhile, the team's investigation of the incident reveals that the perpetrator may be linked to the Jeffersonian. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The remains of a 15-year-old boy are the subject of an investigation that begins to paint an unflattering portrait of the teen, who is initially remembered as being smart though socially awkward, but is ultimately linked to illegal behavior and allegations of rape. programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: When the King of Far Far Away dies, Shrek sets out to find the rightful heir, while Prince Charming tries to seize the kingdom. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A panther leads an orphaned human boy on a trek through the jungle in order to reunite him with his kind. Along the way, the boy encounters a lazy bear, a devious snake and an orangutan who dreams of controlling fire. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: New intern Oliver Wells unnerves Brennan with his unusual observations and impressive logic, which make her consider scientific theories she would have previously ruled out. programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The remains of an immigrant from Sierra Leone are discovered in a barrel at a disposal facility for hazardous waste. Meanwhile, Cam and Arastoo try to keep their relationship under wraps; and Brennan and Booth discuss their vacation plans. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: An investigation of the death of a U.S. marine reveals the deceased's obsession with the apocalypse and a link to a group of doomsday preppers. Meanwhile, Sweets finds an apartment he loves, but Brennan and Booth doubt that he'll move out of their house. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: An undercover police officer who was investigating ATM robberies is murdered and found with a bag of diamonds inside his mutilated body. programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The murder of a TV producer is investigated. Meanwhile, Brennan is shocked by Christine's behavior when she's accused of biting a classmate; and Hodgins turns the lab into a test kitchen in an effort to duplicate intern Finn's hot sauce. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: The investigation of a teen's death involves racial unrest and two police officers. Riley: Earl Hindman. Earl Smith: Danny Johnson. Patrick Flannery: James Georgiades. programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: In the conclusion, Phoebe and Paige set out to rescue a stranded Piper, who has little memory of her Wiccan life. Also: the Valkyries hunt for the warriors who escaped to San Francisco. Oscar: Evan Marriott. Chris: Drew Fuller. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: Sam and Dean live normal, separate lives but they don't seem to know each other, even though they work at the same company. However, when colleagues start committing suicide, they team up to investigate the situation. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.desc: Castiel visits Dean in a dream and tells him he has important news. Dean and Sam set out on a search for Castiel, only to find his human vessel, Jimmy, who yearns for a normal life and to return to his family. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: You Got Served
programme.desc: The members of B2K star in this saga about street-dancers who compete in impromptu contests judged by the public. (cc).

programme.title: The Shack
programme.desc: After enduring a terrible tragedy, a loving father receives a mysterious invitation to visit a nearby shack. There, he experiences a divine intervention from a group of strangers, who lead him on a theological inquiry in order to heal his grief. (cc).

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: In the immediate aftermath of the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, his wife Jacqueline deals with her immense grief while caring for her young family and making plans for his funeral procession. At the same time, a bereaved nation watches on. (cc).

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: An aimless slacker runs out of options when he gets kicked out of his home, but he soon moves in with a woman whom he met at a support group for people with relationship problems. Eventually, she inspires him to get his life together. (cc).

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Bloody revenge saga about a disgraced intelligence agent-turned-bodyguard who becomes a one-man army when the girl he's protecting is kidnapped. (cc).

programme.title: Tightrope
programme.desc: A cop is put on the line when evidence ties him to the prostitute murders he's investigating. Meanwhile, the culprit is likely an S&M fetishist, like the cop. (cc).

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: A wily fox (voice of George Clooney) tries to outsmart three mean-spirited farmers and steal their chickens, but the feud eventually escalates into a battle between the farmers and a community of cunning animals. Other voices include Meryl Streep. Directed by Wes Anderson. (cc).

programme.title: A Walk in the Clouds
programme.desc: A WWII GI poses as the husband of a pregnant, unwed student for the sake of her family. (cc).

programme.title: Waking Ned Devine
programme.desc: Two mates from a tiny Irish village conspire to collect the winnings from a multimillion-dollar lottery ticket that belonged to their late friend, Ned Devine. First up, finding someone to pass for Ned when the Dublin lottery man comes to town. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: Three elderly friends and retired steelworkers are outraged to learn that their pension fund has been raided by a shady corporation. In response, they decide to rob one of the corporation's banks to get their hard-earned money back. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle, family and friends mourn following a disaster, until a revelation from Rev. Anderson compels them to use Amber's special powers. Meanwhile, Allison rejoins her family in Rome. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Lost River

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Three groomsmen awaken after a night of debauchery to learn that the groom is missing, and they attempt to find him before the wedding bells chime. programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick fight a highway construction project that would devastate Jellyfish Fields. (repeat).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: While stranded on a remote island, SpongeBob and his pals seek out surf guru Jack Kahuna Laguna (voice of Johnny Depp), hoping he can teach them how to surf "The Big One"---a challenging wave that will transport them home. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The return of their cloying old chum (Jennifer Coolidge) pits Monica against Phoebe; Joey and Rachel have a hard time getting romantic with one another; and a series of tanning-salon snafus leads to a Ross of a different color. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Emma's first birthday goes from cute to criminal after Rachel realizes that her bunny-shaped cake would feel more at home at a bachelorette party. So while she and Ross race to replace it, the rest fight over who gets to leave before it's too late to carry out their own plans. Judy: Christina Pickles. Jack: Elliott Gould. Estelle: June Gable. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel's Sister Baby-sits
programme.desc: Christina Applegate reprises her Emmy-winning role as Rachel's cluelessly cruel sister Amy, who proves to be Emma's worst baby-sitter ever after she gives the tot a mini-makeover. Meanwhile, Phoebe keeps putting her foot in her mouth every time Mike tries to put a ring on her finger. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear guest stars as Charlie's Nobel Prize-winning ex, who wants her back as much as Ross wants the grant he oversees. Meanwhile, nobody wants the homemade painting Phoebe is giving away; and Chandler gets into hot water with Joey by not casting him in his firm's commercial. Charlie: Aisha Tyler. Masco: Ming Lo. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Home Study
programme.desc: The Bings' road to adoption hits a bump when their social worker realizes she's been to their place before...as one of Joey's many dates. Meanwhile, Mike and Phoebe struggle over donating their wedding fund to a charity other than themselves. Mike: Paul Rudd. Clerk: Matt Winston. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Birth Mother
programme.desc: The Bings head to Ohio to meet the mother (Anna Faris) of a baby they hope to adopt, and end up going to further extremes after she mistakes them for a doctor and a reverend. Back home, Joey has a hard time dating Phoebe's food-picking pal (Annie Parisse). (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
programme.desc: Rachel and Phoebe discover a shocking truth about Chandler after spotting him sneaking around with a mysterious blonde. Meanwhile, the gang looks back on their lives together. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Stripper Cries
programme.desc: Danny DeVito pops in as the girls' worst idea for spicing up Phoebe's bachelorette party; Ross and Chandler recall their college days after running into a mutual love at their reunion; Joey ruins a man's chances of winning big on a game show. Donny Osmond appears as himself. (repeat).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy attempts to help a sightly newcomer to AA, but the situation becomes complicated when she's drawn to him. Elsewhere, Bonnie sets out to attend a lavish charity gala with Jill. Joe Manganiello guest stars. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: Diabetic Lesbians and a Blushing Bride
programme.desc: Marjorie announces she's getting married, so Christy and Bonnie set out to make her wedding a perfect day. Rhea Perlman guest stars. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: Sticky Hands and a Walk on the Wild Side
programme.desc: Christy, Jill and Wendy are drawn into a sticky situation when they're enlisted to help Bonnie smuggle an illegal substance across the Canadian border. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: Death, Death, Death and a Bucket of Chicken
programme.desc: Bonnie's life upends when she has a health scare, as Christy tries to lend support. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray and Pops persuade Barry to lie to Beverly about joining the wrestling team. Meanwhile, Adam is disappointed when Erica cancels their plans to see the premiere of "Return of the Jedi." (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.desc: George learns how to catch a ball; Peppa's family makes pancakes; Peppa develops an appreciation of thunderstorms; Peppa's family plays with a new movie camera; Peppa tries riding her bike without training wheels. (repeat).

programme.desc: Skye and Rocky go camping, but they hit a little detour when Chickaletta gets trapped in a crevice and needs to be rescued; baby turtles appear throughout town, so Ryder and the pups gather them and return them to the pond. (repeat).

programme.desc: TV hero Apollo gets captured by his top enemy and asks Rubble to help him; the circus hippos escape after damaging a trapeze, so Paw Patrol search for the runaway animals. (repeat).

programme.sub-title: The Oracle/The Safety/The Friend/The Saint/The Society/The Spoiler/The Countdown/The Nobody
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joe's mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things aren't going Gumball's way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society... / Gumball and Darwin want to see the scariest film of the year. / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house, so it's up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit.

programme.desc: Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masami's birthday party, Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. / Gumball decides that the best way to prove to Mr. Fitzgerald that he's good enough for Penny is to become his apprentice for the day. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais are delighted when Grandpa Louie gives them a check for $5000. They immediately start fantasizing over what to spend it on. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown, Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. They try to teach her how to resolve the problem peacefully, but Billy has other ideas. / When Darwin taunts Gumball about how predictable he is, Gumball tries to prove that he can still surprise his buddy. / Gumball and Darwin are devastated to learn that Mr. Robinson -- their favourite person in the world -- is selling his house and leaving town. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard day's work, leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise.(n)

programme.desc: The Twirlywoos are beside a river. They watch a fisherman make his rod longer and longer and longer. The fisherman casts out the line and then settles down for a nap. Chickedy and Chick run along the rod to the very end. Toodloo runs along the rod and jumps to join Chickedy and Chick. This causes the rod to spring up sending them flying! The fisherman wakes to discover a long, long, long fish at the end of his line. The Twirlywoo Screen draws a small line that Chickedy and Chick help make longer. Toodloo helps the line get a little longer still but when Great BigHoo taps the screen, the line becomes so long it shoots off the Twirlywoo Screen. The line gets longer and longer and goes into the Big Red Boat - right into Peekaboo's house! The Twirlywoos run after the Twirly Rings whilst Peekaboo reels in the long line.(n)
